text:
```using Combinitorics
function close(s)
               chars = Char.(append!(Vector(32:126),9:13))
               len = length(s)
               v = Vector{Char}(s)
               
               results = String[]
               for i in 1:len
                       for char in chars
                               v[i]=char
                               push!(results, String(v))
                       end
                       v[i]=s[i]
               end
               for (i,j) in combinations(1:len,2)
                       for char1 in chars
                               v[i]=char1             
                               for char2 in chars
                                       v[j]=char2
                                       push!(results, String(v))
                               end
                               v[j]=s[j]
                       end
                       v[i]=s[i]
               end
               return results
       end```
gets all the non insertion/deletion ones in .015 seconds

elements.text:
using Combinitorics
function close(s)
               chars = Char.(append!(Vector(32:126),9:13))
               len = length(s)
               v = Vector{Char}(s)
               
               results = String[]
               for i in 1:len
                       for char in chars
                               v[i]=char
                               push!(results, String(v))
                       end
                       v[i]=s[i]
               end
               for (i,j) in combinations(1:len,2)
                       for char1 in chars
                               v[i]=char1             
                               for char2 in chars
                                       v[j]=char2
                                       push!(results, String(v))
                               end
                               v[j]=s[j]
                       end
                       v[i]=s[i]
               end
               return results
       end
gets all the non insertion/deletion ones in .015 seconds

text:
About 150 ms on my machine
```function Find()
    Ct = 1
    NotA = [Char(i) for i in (9:13)∪(32:60)∪(62:126)]
    A = 'a' #61
    Ans = Vector{String}(undef, 1631129)

    C = fill(A, 8)
    CurrLen = 8

    function Output(Str::Vector{Char})
        Ans[Ct] = String(Str)
        Ct += 1
    end
    function Edit2()
        @inbounds for Pos1 in 1:(CurrLen-1), Pos2 in (Pos1+1):CurrLen
            for Char1 in NotA
                C[Pos1] = Char1
                for Char2 in NotA
                    C[Pos2] = Char2
                    Output(C)
                end
            end
            C[Pos1] = C[Pos2] = A
        end
    end
    function Edit1()
        @inbounds for Pos in 1:CurrLen
            for Char in NotA
                C[Pos] = Char
                Output(C)
            end
            C[Pos] = A
        end
    end
    function AddA()
        CurrLen += 1
        append!(C, A)
    end

    
    Output(C) 
    AddA()
    Edit1()
    Output(C)
    for Tmp in 10:12
        AddA()
        Edit2() 
        Edit1()
        Output(C) 
    end
    Ans
end```

elements.text: About 150 ms on my machine

function Find()

    NotA = [Char(i) for i in (9:13)∪(32:60)∪(62:126)]
    A = 'a' #61
    Ans = Vector{String}(undef, 1631129)

    C = fill(A, 8)
    CurrLen = 8

    function Output(Str::Vector{Char})
        Ans[Ct] = String(Str)
        Ct += 1
    end
    function Edit2()
        @inbounds for Pos1 in 1:(CurrLen-1), Pos2 in (Pos1+1):CurrLen
            for Char1 in NotA
                C[Pos1] = Char1
                for Char2 in NotA
                    C[Pos2] = Char2
                    Output(C)
                end
            end
            C[Pos1] = C[Pos2] = A
        end
    end
    function Edit1()
        @inbounds for Pos in 1:CurrLen

    function AddA()

    Edit1()
    Output(C)
    for Tmp in 10:12

        Edit2() 
        Edit1()
        Output(C)

    Ans
end

text:
And inlining brings it down to 70ms
```function Find()
    NotA = [Char(i) for i in (9:13)∪(32:60)∪(62:126)]
    A = 'a' #61
    Ans = String[]
    sizehint!(Ans, 1631129)

    C = fill(A, 8)
    CurrLen = 8

    @inline Output(Str::Vector{Char}) = push!(Ans, String(Str))
    @inline function Edit2()
        @inbounds for Pos1 in 1:(CurrLen-1), Pos2 in (Pos1+1):CurrLen
            for Char1 in NotA
                C[Pos1] = Char1
                for Char2 in NotA
                    C[Pos2] = Char2
                    Output(C)
                end
            end
            C[Pos1] = C[Pos2] = A
        end
    end
    @inline function Edit1()
        @inbounds for Pos in 1:CurrLen
            for Char in NotA
                C[Pos] = Char
                Output(C)
            end
            C[Pos] = A
        end
    end
    function AddA()
        CurrLen += 1
        push!(C, A)
    end

    
    Output(C) 
    AddA()
    Edit1()
    Output(C)
    for Tmp in 10:12
        AddA()
        Edit2() 
        Edit1()
        Output(C) 
    end
    Ans
end```

elements.text: And inlining brings it down to 70ms

function Find()
    NotA = [Char(i) for i in (9:13)∪(32:60)∪(62:126)]
    A = 'a' #61
    Ans = String[]
    sizehint!(Ans, 1631129)

    C = fill(A, 8)
    CurrLen = 8

    @inline Output(Str::Vector{Char}) = push!(Ans, String(Str))
    @inline function Edit2()
        @inbounds for Pos1 in 1:(CurrLen-1), Pos2 in (Pos1+1):CurrLen
            for Char1 in NotA
                C[Pos1] = Char1
                for Char2 in NotA
                    C[Pos2] = Char2
                    Output(C)
                end
            end
            C[Pos1] = C[Pos2] = A
        end
    end
    @inline function Edit1()
        @inbounds for Pos in 1:CurrLen
            for Char in NotA
                C[Pos] = Char
                Output(C)
            end
            C[Pos] = A
        end
    end
    function AddA()
        CurrLen += 1
        push!(C, A)
    end

    
    Output(C) 
    AddA()
    Edit1()
    Output(C)
    for Tmp in 10:12
        AddA()
        Edit2() 
        Edit1()
        Output(C) 
    end
    Ans
end

text:
```function S(Edit, N)
    NotA = length([Char(i) for i in (9:13)∪(32:60)∪(62:126)])
    Tmp(CurrLen, EditCt) = NotA^EditCt*binomial(CurrLen,EditCt)
    Ans = sum(sum(Tmp(CurrLen, EditCt) for EditCt in 0:(CurrLen-N+Edit)) for CurrLen in (N-Edit):N)
    Ans += sum(sum(Tmp(CurrLen, EditCt) for EditCt in 0:Edit) for CurrLen in (N+1):(N+Edit))
end

julia> S(2,10)
1631129

julia> S(3,10)
770257033```

elements.text:
function S(Edit, N)
    NotA = length([Char(i) for i in (9:13)∪(32:60)∪(62:126)])
    Tmp(CurrLen, EditCt) = NotA^EditCt*binomial(CurrLen,EditCt)
    Ans = sum(sum(Tmp(CurrLen, EditCt) for EditCt in 0:(CurrLen-N+Edit)) for CurrLen in (N-Edit):N)
    Ans += sum(sum(Tmp(CurrLen, EditCt) for EditCt in 0:Edit) for CurrLen in (N+1):(N+Edit))
end

julia> S(2,10)
1631129

julia> S(3,10)
770257033
